en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Enhanced Wood Att. and Enhanced Dark Att. awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 明晰のエメラルド
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の木と闇属性強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 명석의 에메랄드
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 나무와 어둠속성 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Emerald of Clarity
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Enhanced Wood, Dark Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
